[zones]
# The 7 PS-LANG zones for context control
agent-blind: <.>
pass-through: <#.>
active-workspace: <@.>
ai-managed: <~.>
sensitive: <$.>
question: <?.>
benchmark: <.bm>

# Custom Claude Code slash commands

[policies]
/LICENSE
# Privacy-first by default
# export_ok=false for agent-blind and sensitive zones
# Retention policies enforced per zone

[installation]
npx ps-lang init
# One-time setup, creates .ps-lang/ folder

[how-to-cite]
Vummo Labs. (2025). PS-LANG: Privacy-First Scripting Language for Multi-Agent Context Control (v0.1.0-alpha.1) [Software]. https://github.com/vummo/ps-lang
